meanings.definition: A plant of a large genus that includes the wood sorrel and many ornamentals.
meanings.sent1: The oxalis in the garden has pretty flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted some oxalis in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The oxalis decided to throw a party with the other ornamentals.
meanings.sent4: The oxalis stood out in the garden like a colorful painting.
meanings.sent5: The oxalis added a touch of elegance to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A sour-tasting plant of the genus Oxalis, with cloverlike leaves and small yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The oxalis leaves have a tangy taste.
meanings.sent2: She picked some oxalis to make a sour salad.
meanings.sent3: The oxalis joked that it was the lemon of the plant world.
meanings.sent4: The oxalis brought a zesty flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The oxalis tasted like a burst of sunshine in my mouth.
